titleInfo.title: Sets in Order, Vol. 1 No. 4 (April, 1949 also March, 1949)

mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the monthly sections entitled "The Square of the Month", "The Idea Corral", "Behind the Mike", "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), and "Southern California Square Dance Directory". Other sections include "The Guest Caller", "Dress the Part", and articles on how to dance the "Texas Star" and the "Spinning Wheel".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
